content: आर्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आ-ऋ-क्त] {@--1@} Afflicted with, struck by, suffering from, pained by; usually in <ab>comp.</ab>, कामार्त, क्षुधार्त तृषार्त &c. {@--2@} Sick, diseased; आर्तस्य यथौषधं <ls>R. 1. 28</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 236.</ls> {@--3@} Distressed, afflicted, struck by calamity, oppressed, unhappy; आर्तत्राणाय वः शस्त्रं न ग्रहर्तुमनागसि <ls>Ś. 1. 11</ls>, <ls>R. 2. 28</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 31</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 10</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">32.</ls> {@--4@} Perishable (विनाशिन्).
